763d95ec-1c9d-4770-b1c0-d3e4edd875de.description: This badge is awarded to those that complete the Documents Essentials Consultant-Led Course.
763d95ec-1c9d-4770-b1c0-d3e4edd875de.name: Documents Essentials

badge_template_activities.title: A prerequisite to other consultant-led training, Documents Essentials is the first of three courses that defines the concepts for configuration of MasterControl Documents. The other two courses are Intermediate and Advanced Documents Essentials. Earners of this badge learn best practices for controlling and managing documents using MasterControl, and create a baseline configuration in a practice site to prepare for configuration.

5bbd1ef6-7e19-4607-bd7c-3ea735d15ac7.description: This badge is awarded to those that complete the Training Essentials Consultant-Led Course.
5bbd1ef6-7e19-4607-bd7c-3ea735d15ac7.name: Training Essentials

badge_template_activities.title: This course should be taken after Documents Essentials (which is a prerequisite). It introduces configuration concepts specific to the Training module within MasterControl. Earners of this badge learn how to configure the training module, including management of roles, courses, exams, reports, etc.

71b1d06d-cfb4-458f-b180-1d79e17e8aa2.description: Earners of the MasterControl Certified Level 1 SysAdmin credential demonstrate extensive knowledge and skill in navigating and administering one of the following MasterControl modules: Documents; Training; Production Records; Audit; or Process. Interested in earning this badge? Contact your MasterControl sales representative to get enrolled.
71b1d06d-cfb4-458f-b180-1d79e17e8aa2.name: MasterControl Certified Level 1 Admin

alignments.name: MasterControl Self-Study Learning Portal
alignments.description: Preparation for the exams includes meticulous study of the MasterControl self-study learning portal, which houses high-quality, easy-to-reference educational content for SysAdmins and other MasterControl users.

badge_template_activities.title: Certified SysAdmins complete a three-part exam for each level. The process includes hands-on tasks, short essay questions, and an objective-response test.
Prospective MasterControl Certified SysAdmins must have at least six months of hands-on experience with the system before attempting a certification exam.
Earners maintain their credential by completing a recertification exam every two years. The exam's content includes questions about best practices and latest updates within MasterControl.

9f1d0aca-9365-4194-85b3-2f3ba0db3d39.description: This badge is awarded to those that complete the Intermediate Documents Essentials Consultant-Led Course.
9f1d0aca-9365-4194-85b3-2f3ba0db3d39.name: Intermediate Documents Essentials

badge_template_activities.title: This course follows Documents Essentials (which is a prerequisite) and precedes Advanced Documents Essentials. This course introduces additional configuration concepts at a greater level of depth to help you control and manage documents in MasterControl. Earners of this badge learn different types of workflows, review global settings, and discuss system-management practices.

e8b1e0a7-e3c9-4d3f-9268-5e87408aff80.description: Earners of the MasterControl Certified Level 2 SysAdmin credential demonstrate extensive knowledge and skill in navigating and administering two of the following MasterControl modules: Documents; Training; Production Records; Audit; or Process. Interested in earning this badge? Contact your MasterControl sales representative to get enrolled.
e8b1e0a7-e3c9-4d3f-9268-5e87408aff80.name: MasterControl Certified Level 2 Admin

03c14352-ee9c-4b66-9ffb-00cf3614ce51.description: This badge is awarded to those that complete the New Admin Essentials Directed Demonstrations or Consultant-Led courses.
03c14352-ee9c-4b66-9ffb-00cf3614ce51.name: New Admin Essentials

badge_template_activities.title: This class is designed for New Admins from customer sites with an existing configured system. This class covers managing and maintaining a configured system.

8b650c0f-a9e2-424d-9108-51b342dace2b.description: This badge is awarded to those that complete the Audit Essentials Consultant-Led Course.
8b650c0f-a9e2-424d-9108-51b342dace2b.name: Audit Essentials

badge_template_activities.title: This course should be taken after Documents Essentials (which is a prerequisite). It introduces configuration concepts specific to the Audit module within MasterControl. Earners of this badge learn best practices for configuring Audit InfoCard Types and maintaining their audit schedule.

eac925f8-a5a4-4114-99b0-67d0b51f3492.name: Process Essentials

badge_template_activities.title: Earners of this badge will be able to understand and identify the concepts of configuration in the MasterControl Process Module, use the tools to implement MasterControl within your business process, prepare for the next phase of rollout, and execute management of the Process Module.

cbe5396e-9262-4506-820e-ef23cf0bbd6b.description: This badge is awarded to those that complete the Advanced Documents Essentials Consultant-Led Course.
cbe5396e-9262-4506-820e-ef23cf0bbd6b.name: Advanced Documents

badge_template_activities.title: This course should be taken after Documents Essentials (which is a prerequisite). This course will give you advanced information on the Documents Module, including managing users, managing the system, managing document packets, preventing user errors, and creating configurations.

7a5d1dca-19a5-402b-a7a3-89cc14c3b68c.description: This badge is awarded to those that complete the Documents/Training Foundations course.
7a5d1dca-19a5-402b-a7a3-89cc14c3b68c.name: Documents & Training Fundamentals

badge_template_activities.title: Documents/Training Foundations is a comprehensive three-day in-person course taught by experienced consultants that covers the essentials of administering the Documents and Training Modules in MasterControl. Earners of this badge learn best practices for controlling and managing documents using MasterControl, and how to manage roles, courses, exams, reports, and more.
